about.title: ABOUT ME
about.subtitle: Passionate about creating exceptional web experiences
description: I'm a full stack developer based in Lyon, specializing in creating modern and elegant web applications with attention to detail and user experience.
With several years of experience in web development, I've worked on various projects ranging from showcase websites to complex applications with sophisticated architectures.
My philosophy is centered on creating solutions that combine aesthetics and functionality, using the most suitable technologies for each project.
